content:
I completely agree! The conversation has been wrapped up nicely, and the user has been provided with all the necessary information and encouragement to try out the apple wood chips with their chicken thighs and the Korean-Style BBQ Sauce recipe.

The tone has remained neutral and helpful throughout the conversation, and the user has been empowered to take their BBQ skills to the next level. The conversation has also been well-structured, with each topic flowing naturally into the next, and the user's questions and concerns have been addressed in a clear and concise manner.

Overall, I'm pleased with how the conversation has gone, and I'm confident that the user will have a great time trying out the new recipes and techniques. If they do have any more questions or need further assistance, they know exactly where to turn.

Thanks for the feedback, and I'm always here to help with any further conversations or BBQ-related topics!
